{"id":547064528,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 week, 6 days","timestamp":1630387320,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/547064528/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"N/A","code":"#pragma GCC optimize(\"Ofast\")\n#pragma GCC target(\"avx,avx2,fma\")\nstatic auto _ = []() {\n  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n  cin.tie(nullptr);\n  cout.tie(nullptr);\n  return 0;\n}();\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        if(n==1)return 1;\n        vector<int>dp(n+2,INT_MAX);\n        dp[1]=1;\n        dp[2]=2;\n        dp[3]=3;        \n        for(int i=4;i<=n;i++)\n        {\n            int t=sqrt(i);\n            if(t*t==i)\n            {\n                dp[i]=1;\n                continue;\n            }\n            for(int j=i-1;j>=t;j--)\n            {\n              dp[i]=min(dp[i],(dp[j]+dp[i-j]));\n              if(dp[i]==2)break;\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares"}
